Matt Damon and Ben Affleck made such a
groundbreaking movie by placing their
own fictional story within the actual
Boston environment of the 1990s they
achieved the perfect balance of truth
and style that many Boston movies have
since tried to emulate this balance is
something I think about when I write
these videos make it flashy but keep it
